website_summaries.verdict: An elegant lamp that adds distinction and style to your home.
pros: Graceful vintage look and simple assembly
cons: A few owners say they're not satisfied w/the stained glass colors

customer_reviews.title: Defective screw in for base bulb
customer_reviews.text: I tried to change my base bulb which had begun to flicker. It flickers because it does not screw in tightly nor does any replacement bulb. You turn so far and then it falls out. Very disappointing to have spent this much and have a defective part. I keep the base on all the time as the lamp colors are very dark and it is unattractive unless lit. I can live with that, based on thus type of lamp, but not a defective base!
customer_reviews.author: bren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What can I Say - LOVE LOVE LOVE my new lamp!!! ❤️ It's gorgeous, substantial, colorful and just perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: STUNNING!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are absolutely THRILLED with this gorgeous Tiffany style lamp! Everything about it is quality and we love the little light in the base (2 bulbs in the top). We keep all 3 lights on when we want to enjoy it as it is very dark when not lit. But what a stunning and unusual piece of art when it is! Very heavy and a very nice size for our living room. It is described as real glass and certainly looks like it. Beautiful lamp-GREAT PRICE-buy it! We are so glad we did!!!
customer_reviews.author: lin grant

customer_reviews.title: A very nice lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: A very nice lamp for the price. I also keep the base lit all the time. No issues with oil on the glass. However, there were no nuts included for the very long prongs with which to attach the base. I actually brought the lamp to Ace hardware, and got nuts to fit -- four for 28 cents or so. The prongs are quite long, and I added at least ten washers on each. Luckily, I had these at hand. Expect a trip to the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Marklaj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well made lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I returned this item because the colors just did not match my decor, but I want to say that it is a well made, beautiful lamp! I wish I could have made it work but that didn't happen. I purchased a different Tiffany style lamp and the workmanship does not compare. It made me sad to have to let this one go back. BTW: the packaging and shipping was fantastic :)
customer_reviews.author: Babe1223

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice,great color!Always wanted a Tiffany type lamp and this is a good one.Just have to figure out what bulbs to use to maximize the effect. Update:Installed a 60 watt equivalent candleabra LED bulb inside and 2 60 watt equivalent LEDs in the main ones all 5600k.Looks very nice with these.Base and top balanced and matching.5600k is a whitish shade and 2700k has more a yellow glow that probably wouldnt work well.
customer_reviews.author: William K.

customer_reviews.title: Bad wiring
customer_reviews.text: One side stopped working. Bad wiring or something. Took the bulb out.. it works in any other lamp.
customer_reviews.author: kevin p

customer_reviews.title: I have to say, I've owned my lamp for just over 3 years
customer_reviews.text: I've read through the reviews and I have to say, I've owned my lamp for just over 3 years now and I'm very happy with my purchase. It's next to my bed and it gets used on a regular basis. All the lights still work, the switch for the base still works just fine, its not falling apart anywhere... I have to say, 3 years in... no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Turley

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Simply gorgeous Tiffany style lamp. Real glass and black solder, great colors with blues dominating for the most part. We put a 90 lumen LED bulb in the base, which seems about the right brightness as a beautiful night light. Two 40 watt equivalent Edison LED bulbs for the top seems to be a good balance between showing off the lamp's colors and providing decent light. A great lamp at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Will VONDAUSTER

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave 4 Stars instead of 5 is because the lamp has a functionality issue. I would like to be able to turn on and off the top lamp portion and the bottom base individually from each other. Instead, you have to have on the base in order to light the top portion. No big deal, but would be a nice feature. Also, the base gets a bit hot. Not sure if this could be a concern.
customer_reviews.author: UnclePV

customer_reviews.title: They are gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! I just amore my lamps. Yes.. two! One on each night stand. They are gorgeous. I love love how they have a night light. I would buy over again. The price was so reasonable for a piece like this.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it’s nice to spoil yourself, with something special.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a striking addition to the bedroom - I’m not very handy person, but I managed to get this together with the simple instructions, no tools necessary, I used the enclosed cloth to buff it up, and voila, there you have it - The most comment-worthy, illuminating feature in your home. Even the plumber (there to fix the master bath, and not someone I’d peg as even remotely interested in interior design) commented on how nice it looked.
customer_reviews.author: BETH B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stained glass.
customer_reviews.text: That is the only thing nice I can say about this light. They spent the money on the glass work. The base was cheap (like a pop can thin). The pole that held on the shade was not straight. The glass night light part would move in the base, it would not secure.
customer_reviews.author: Arjay Miller

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was packaged well, and arived on time. It is absolutely gorgeous!!! Takes 2 60w bulbs on top and comes with a bottom light. There is some light assembly, nothing hard. Very substantial looking conversation piece. For the price this is a perfect addition to any space. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JENNJENNIFER315

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful, except for the base
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful, except for the base. It's a lot lighter than I expected, so the glass must be very thin. It seems sturdy, though, and looks great lit up. The colors are truly spectacular. The base is very cheap metal with a monotone finish that detracts from the overall appearance. I'll probably repaint it some day.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Tim

customer_reviews.title: Wearhouse of Tiffany Dragonfly style
customer_reviews.text: I love these lamps, bought 2 and the light inside the base has already burned out when arrived one of the glass pieces was broken in half, Ofcourse it had to be a clear piece and so noticeable, so I keep the base light turned off... disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Busdriverkel

customer_reviews.title: Warehouse of Tiffany's T18275TGRB Dragonfly Tiffany-Style 26-Inch Table Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lamp! My wife and I ordered this lamp over a month ago to match the floor standing Dragonfly Tiffany-Style lamp and what an amazing ambiance it has created for our living room! The colors are vivid and add a classy touch to the existing decor. There are 3 light settings which includes a light bulb presence at the bottom of the lamp for a variety of settings. We don't mind that it's not the real thing (Tiffany stained glass that costs hundreds of dollars more)...but for the price, we absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: rooster6758

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is fabulous and I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is fabulous and I absolutely love it!! It radiates color, beauty and peace! I have also bought 4 of the red ones' and they are even better! Love these lamps! The best part is the bottom lights up or you can also light up the top piece as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lonun Skinny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp; however
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp; however, the bottom light has to be on in order to turn on the top lights. There is a toggle switch on the cord that turns on the power to the lamp. You can turn off and on the top lights, but cannot turn off the bottom light when the top lights are on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ms. Happy in Maryland
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp in 2011, the lamp is absolutely beautiful. The bottom base bulb blew out several months ago an my husband replaced the bulb on new years eve 2015. I am writing this review, because I forgot just how beautiful the lamp is. I have seven Tiffany style lamps and an two hanging from the ceiling an love every one. I have two in my husband man cave. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty Lamp
customer_reviews.text: First of all I have no idea why some have said this is plastic, it's definitely made of glass as advertised. It's much larger in person than I expected but that's my fault for not paying attention to the measurements! I could nitpick little things about it, but for the price I don't think you'll find any other Tiffany style lamp nearly this nice! It's very pretty and I like being able to have just the base light on if I want. The shipping was quick and it arrived much sooner than I expected. I think it's really lovely and I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very pretty and I was happy with it at first. Now the on/off switch has literally fallen off the wire so there is no way to turn it on. I was prepared to try to replace the wire but can’t find a substitute and the Product support window has closed so I guess I can’t ask. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Santoro

customer_reviews.title: My "Heirloom" Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Everyone visiting my home for the first time immediately "ooohs" and "aaahs" when they see my dragonfly lamp - adding how much they wish they could afford one. Needless to say, I just say "Thank you. We love it, too." Why not? They wouldn't believe me anyway if I told them I purchased it on Amazon.com. It's been almost a year now and I still am happy we chose this lamp. It's beautiful. Even with just the night light lit.
customer_reviews.author: idaleep

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lamps. They look beautiful and are well made. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp at an affordable price. The base tends to get hot, the bottom bulb doesn't last long. and it's not easy to replace since it's necessary to take the metal base off first. Wish there was a way to keep the top bulbs on without the base light too. Still, it's worth the price for this lovely lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Quiet Nature Lover

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant table lamps that were packaged perfect for shipping to Alaska. They give off beautiful warm light with the dragonfly highlight on the shade. Base light allows for illuminating the perfect amount of night lighting to allow for sleeping. A home run!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Well made piece. A pleasure to use. It could stand to be brighter as you are limited to 60W bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: It's Stunning
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful lamp and sets the tone for your decor. I put a 60w led candelabra bulb in the base, it really makes the colors pop. I would recommend anyone who loves Tiffany, but loves on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Diana G. Ohara

customer_reviews.title: My Tiffany Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a colorful lamp to replace a 30 year old hurricane lamp that was in disrepair. The Dragonfly lamp caught my eye and i read all the reviews. It seemed like a logical choice and i wasn't dissappointed. It arrived very safely packed in styrofoam, and in excellent shape. It is everything i expected and more. I use colored bulbs in the upper part and it makes a wonderful TV lamp. My only regret is that it is made in China, but it would have cost double what i paid otherwise. I am totoally happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp for the price. I am impressed that this glass and metal lamp could be constructed, assembled, very securely packaged, shipped around the world from China to my home and is sitting out on my porch for about $80, less than it cost to take my wife and kids out to dinner. The only extras I had to buy were the two upper light bulbs. The lower one was included installed.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: What a cool lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool lamp. Yes, it's probably mass produced in China, but it has some cool elements. It has an old inline roll switch on the power cord. The base is heavy and sturdy. The shade is heavy and colorful. I installed medium wattage antique style reproduction bulbs (available here on Amazon) that give it a low, warm glow when turned on. Each light has a separate pull chain to turn on/off however many lights you want. Definitely a romantic light to have on your nightstand, or wherever you put it.
customer_reviews.author: OitsKev

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. I normally don't like blue, but my office theme is navy and gold. This is GORGEOUS. It's bigger than it looks, but that is a plus for me. It's striking and gorgeous. The only negative? My mom saw it and now wants one!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous lamp, NOT PLASTIC.
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful lamp. It looks exactly as the pictures. It's the focal point of my dining room now, and everyone is so jelly lol. Someone on here said it was made of plastic. I closely inspected it, and it's clearly glass. I don't even know how you'd mistake it for plastic. There's always that one person I guess. The lights work and everything. The dragonfly wings really stand out, they look like sparkly rhinestones (but they're not). I will include pictures. I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: ... my second Tiffany lamp from you first one I love this one I love it and it is so ...
customer_reviews.text: Here we go my second Tiffany lamp from you first one I love this one I love it and it is so beautiful! My friends and family love them to notice them right away when they came into my home thank you so much for making this possible exclamation park! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ajmdipmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a beautiful lamp.
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful lamp. Well packed for delivery and easily assembled. The colors a magnificent. We have gotten many compliments. It sits on the end of our bar and gives us the look we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: dlorberter

customer_reviews.title: Glad I did not pay more
customer_reviews.text: Glad I did not pay more! Quality marginal. The base lamp is wired to the in cord switch so it is on all the time to use pull chains. Should have a separate switch!
customer_reviews.author: Wolfden

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Be Happier!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning lamp! Received early and lamp was completely enclosed in a styrofoam box inside the cardboard box. Took about two minutes to assemble. I'm using lower wattage bulbs in mine and to me, the colors are much prettier. We use the lamp base as a night light and haven't turned it off yet. This is a large lamp, it is real glass and metal. The price is incredible for the quality! I'm totally loving it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Shipped in perfect condition and arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying this lamp. Shipped in perfect condition and arrived on time. Easy to put together. The color variations in the glass is interesting to look at and love the dragonfly design. The wings on each dragonfly are really quite beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan C. Bunnell

customer_reviews.title: Buy this lamp - you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: Waited to post this review to be sure the lamps were as good as I thought. This was an outstanding purchase - couldn't be happier with the price, packaging, look and usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: LLL

customer_reviews.title: The blue is like a peacock blue
customer_reviews.text: Not the color in pic!! I was expected a combo of blues with greens that sort of give off a teal look but its actually a cobalt blue! There are different tones of blue, however and tey are pretty but does not look like the pic. Also it is not very sturdy but it looks impressive and has quite a good bright light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamps
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. Be aware that these are very large.
customer_reviews.author: TV Watchin' Steve

customer_reviews.title: Delightful Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Not much to assemble. Has "place-of-pride" in my bedroom. Perfect for reading and the night light in bottom is a great help to this 83-yr. old.
customer_reviews.author: Gwamma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice. Avg size tamp, end table size not to small not to big.
customer_reviews.author: MakoShark222

customer_reviews.title: This lamp was the perfect addition to my living room
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was the perfect addition to my living room. It is beautiful and well made. Its cost was very reasonable and appears to be a much more expensive lamp than the cost was.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA MCGOWAN

customer_reviews.title: Blue, not teal as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: If it would have been the teal color that was advertised I would have given it 5 stars. It is very pretty, not plastic like some peoples reviews said, but I was specifically looking for a lamp with teal for decorating purposes and this lamp is cobalt blue. Still like it, but it will have to go somewhere else and I'll have to find another lamp now and spend more money. As pretty as it is, I feel like it's false advertising and that it would have been an absolutely stunning lamp, as opposed to just a "pretty" lamp, if it were in the teal color as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Super shinay!!!! 10 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOSH!!!!! I FREAKING GET SO MANY STINKING COMPLIMENTS ON THIS BEAUTIFUL STAINED GLASS LAMP! ITS A TREASURE OF MY TREASURES A GUIDING LIGHT TO LIFES SIMPLE PLEASURES REALIZED THE BETTER TO SEE TO EAT YOU WITH!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Timmmaaaayyyy

customer_reviews.title: Tiffany Dragonfly lamps
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my daughters 41th birthday they own a very large and beautiful home and I wanted to get her something special from us so this was it. These lamps are breathtakingly beautiful and well made and my daughter loves them and so dose everyone who sees them you can not believe how nice they look. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous lamp with vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous lamp, I was a little nervous when I ordered it wondering if the colors on the glass would be bright. Well, the photo does not do this lamp justice, the colors are vibrant, and the dragon flies are easy to see. I've had compliments from everyone that has seen it. Definitely worth the money and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Debra DeFrain

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Blown away by the quality of this lamp! We’ve received many compliments on it and I’ll admit it is much more beautiful than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Adelmeyer

customer_reviews.title: I use it next to my bedside and absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: OMG.....this lamp looks so RICH!!! I use it next to my bedside and absolutely love it!!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is do beautiful, it's prettier than pictured. Came well packaged, on time and easy to put together. Looks much more expensive , I've gotten so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: barbara l

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite thing in the tv room! It's a focal point, for sure. It lights up 3 ways...just the base, for soft romantic lighting, or left & right sides of the shade, or one or the other off, and/or all 3 on at the same time. These are a few of my favorites things...as the song goes....
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not my colors if you like pastel blue it's perfect for you.
customer_reviews.text: Love the lamp not the color that fits in my house.. I moved things around I am keeping it but hoped it would have a little more Green blue.. I read the reviews took a chance.. If you don't like red white and baby blue it's not for you.. Otherwise very nice lamp!
customer_reviews.author: HMann

customer_reviews.title: Lovely table lamp.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace the same design/style of Tiffany lamp we had that was damaged in a move. We love the lamp the only caveat is that it is described as being green in color (as was our previous lamp), this lamp is blue.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Day

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is absolutely adorable. The base lights up as a nightlight and ...
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is absolutely adorable. The base lights up as a nightlight and I can easily read by the light it gives off in the lamp itself. The colors are brilliant and stunning. It is exactly what I have been looking for. I think I will buy another one for the living room shortly!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! Great lamp for decoration, reading and used as night light! Thank you for great product! It looks better then on photo, especially when lit. It was delivered fast, it was easy to assemble even for me (I am bad at it), and it looks stunning!
customer_reviews.author: Kreina Clement

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: beautiful lamp, love it. It was advertised warehouse of tiffany but the actual manufacturer is serena de italia. I would still repurchase even knowing this now!
customer_reviews.author: jilly

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous!!! Very tall. Perfect lamp. Hoping to get a 2nd.
customer_reviews.author: dknight219

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL DETAIL
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful! One of my favorite things in our new house!
customer_reviews.author: too busy to shop in stores

customer_reviews.title: Lights up my livingroom.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, though it's a little bigger than I expected, but it looks great. I leave the small bulb in the base on all the time, makes a nice night light. Assembly was easy, just a couple steps, but you will now own a HUGE chunk of packing foam.
customer_reviews.author: Mickeydid

customer_reviews.title: You don't find stuff like this any more
customer_reviews.text: You don't find stuff like this any more - solid, leaded glass. Feels like it's 100 years old. Beautiful light when turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Gooch

customer_reviews.title: Wow! What A Deal!
customer_reviews.text: not only is this the most beautiful thing in my home, beautiful craftmanship and wonderful colors, im shocked i got a tiffany style lamp this beautiful and this BIG for the price. these lamps (usually mush smaller and not nearly as charming) usually range between $250-$400 atleast! im very proud that i made this purchase, not only am i very please with the lamp but at a price like that you just cant beat. i recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: stkncb31

customer_reviews.title: Looking glass tiffany
customer_reviews.text: This Tiffany lamp is so perfect. It is quality leaded glass. There is no plastic anywhere like other reviews have stated.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I'm sooooo happy I made the decision to get this lamp
customer_reviews.text: I'm sooooo happy I made the decision to get this lamp! As soon as you walk into my living room this lamps stands out! I know the lamp will become a great conversation piece when I have friends and family gatherings! Now I'm looking buy another lamp, but different style!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Sebree

customer_reviews.title: I love the way you can adjust the amout of light ...
customer_reviews.text: I have received alot of compliments on this lamp. I love the way you can adjust the amout of light you get.
customer_reviews.author: Episode

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous tiffany style lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors on this lamp! It's so beautiful and came in one piece as described.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Pasqualetto

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamps!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lamps! Beautifully crafted and designed. Great value for the price, lights in base makes it really show.
customer_reviews.author: Tori mattox

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: A lovely little lamp indeed. Perfect for the bedroom bureau.
customer_reviews.author: Widowedwalker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty design.
customer_reviews.text: Used in a bedroom. Purchased this design mainly for the nightlight function. One item to keep in mind, if you turn off the nightlight, the lamp also will not work, as the nightlight switch is inline.
customer_reviews.author: John Novicki

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning. My son bought this for his mother for Christmas. Hands down her favorite gift.
customer_reviews.author: ac

customer_reviews.title: A most have.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp, I gave it to my mother as a gift, she loves it, the packing is perfect I was scared the lamp would break but was perfectly fine,
customer_reviews.author: Gus Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: shade is well made, base, not so much ...
customer_reviews.text: shade is well made, base, not so much. Have been making stained glass for years and this a bit "novice". Guess it's ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia S.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous lamp
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is beautiful. We put a stronger LED bulb in the base so the colors would show. It's definately a statement piece. I'm very satisfied with this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Sherluthien

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This light is beautiful- the three light settings are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Metty

customer_reviews.title: at 112 $ you haven't bought ot yet ..its pure class A+
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product looks like you paid 600 bucks .and at 112 $ they're giving it away ..just buy it ot is beautiful everything is so cool ...just so u know its blue primary. .we paid alot more than 112 ...everything about this lamp says class .
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Reject
customer_reviews.text: This product is a DIY should never been for sale
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The craftsmanship is excellent and my daughter will love it
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was everything and more than I expected. The craftsmanship is excellent and my daughter will love it. I purchased it for her for this upcoming mothers day. I know she will be very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and beautiful. Comes with base bulb
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and beautiful. Comes with base bulb. You will need to supply 2 main bulbs. Great purchase to accent our living room.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Much better and bigger than expected Tiffany's lamp, very beautiful, they send it in a very protective package, so no breakages and mine was reshipped to Puerto Rico via USPS and still arrived perfect, easy to setup, I may buy another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Colon Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful with great value and price.
customer_reviews.text: We have a vintage home, collect antiques, old world collectibles and art. We are delighted with this lamp. It has exquisite detail! It was simple to assemble and the light in the base was provided. I don’t think you could find a lovelier lamp unless you purchase an actual Tiffany.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Crawford

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice lamp.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very attractive. It makes my living room look much nicer. The quality is appropriate for the cost, maybe better then what the cost is. It is made of glass and pewter (I think because of no lead warnings on box). I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nukem

customer_reviews.title: a Beautiful lamp and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: You will be proud to have these lamps in your home. they are more attractive in person than in the online photos.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Burger

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful lamp
customer_reviews.text: Gave it 5 stars because it looks beautiful when all lit up. The only thing that could be better is the base. The lamp needs to be in a spot where it can't get bumped so it doesn't tip over. Other Tiffany lamps I have have a VERY heavy base, so they are very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Christa Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat it it is very beautiful. It is a lighter weight lamp compared to a 600 or thousand dollar lamp but for the price again I say well worth it! we have it on a timer just so gas can see it lit up beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: BUCKROBERTS77

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I love Tiffany-type shades, so I bought this lamp on a whim. Wow! It exceeded my expectations by miles. It's easily assembled and arrived well-packaged and in perfect condition. It's heavy , won't tip easily. And it looks awesome when lit. The bottom section has a small "nite-lite" bulb in it; the top holds two 60 watt bulbs. You can light bottom, top, or both. It's not a reading lamp, but it really buffs up my "ambience!" And for relatively short money!
customer_reviews.author: quincysteve

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! Packaged well, easy to assemble, very stable. Gorgeous colors, providing just the right amount of light for reading as well as for the room. Grateful for the included night light bulb, but will definitely follow other's recommendations for a 40 watt bulb which will do the colors in the base justice. After several days of looking at lamps and reviews, I am so happy I made this selection. Stands out and has already received many compliments. Really brightens our room and is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: MISSING CRITICAL PARTS ON TOP
customer_reviews.text: Headline says it all,,,,Moving on,,, use LED ONLY,,,no heat and less wattage, I used 2, 100 watt bulbs on top. Bottom uses a small very low wattage bulb,,,, use LED ONLY here to,,,,any wattage is better then origional. NOTE: when lifting top shade use 2 hands only, other wise you will stress glass. Use dimmer switch if to bright,,,, with a little rewiring you can separate top and bottom lights, Incase you want to use bottom as a separate night light. Off to the hardware store ,,,see if I can avoid returning lamp.
customer_reviews.author: William Coyne

customer_reviews.title: I love these beautiful lamps
customer_reviews.text: I love these beautiful lamps. Nice quality for price. Nice you can use bottom light only if you don't want too much light.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are beautiful. Love the base lights and I use those all the time while watching tv. Had a glitch with my order and the seller took care of it right away. Great communication, great lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Gardengirl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a very very nice tiffany table lamb. excellent buy 4 the price
customer_reviews.author: Bic

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.  Exceeded our expectations.  Have had numerous compliments on this lanp.
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleasantly surprised at the artistic look of this lamp. Would certainly order again if in the market for another tiffany style lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is stunning with the lights (base and top) on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Mizzunkey

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is just what my wife wanted. It is attractive and colorful. It is well constructed and it was packed especially well. Everything came through well. We highly recommend this item and Warehouse of Tiffany.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry in Albuquerque

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Much larger than I expected, packaged very well, I put blue light bulbs in it and it glows sky blue. LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lamp is beautiful! Had alot of wonderful comments! Sitting in my front window! Color of glass is brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Gatchell

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful lamp and would be a wonderful addition to any living room! Especially love it when lit, showing off the colors. It has a little more blue than expected, but looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Linda

customer_reviews.title: ponderous
customer_reviews.text: dark, big, ugly when off, sent it back and got a different lamp
customer_reviews.author: bhumi b.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love my Warehouse of Tiffany Dragonfly lamp. It exceeds my expectations & looks great in my sunroom :) . It's much bigger than I thought it'd be & a great deal for the money. A++
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: stunning lamps
customer_reviews.text: these lamps are so beautiful, I can't stop looking at them when they're lit. The quality is excellent and they were shipped without any damage. I would highly recommend these lamps.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp. Exactly as described. Love the colors!! Easy to put together. Great price

product_meta.title: HomeRoots Warehouse of Tiffany's T18275TGRB Dragonfly Tiffany-Style Table Lamp with Lighted Base, 26" x 18" x 18", Blue and Red
product_meta.description:
Tiffany-Style Dragonfly Lamp with Lighted Base. The primary colors are blue and red. It has jewels in it. The dimensions are 18''L x 26''H x 18''W. The Base Lights up. It requires 2 bulbs with a max of 60watts plus 1 bulb with a a max of 25 watts for the base. It has pull chain switch in it. It has more than 400pcs. Of cut glass. Each glass is individually cut and wrap around copper foil and soldered together.

AMAZON.COM


See larger image. An enduring style that will warm your home with its light and artistry, this Dragonfly Tiffany-style table lamp features a classic design that's been hand-assembled using the copper foil technique developed by Louis Comfort Tiffany. Measuring 26 inches tall, the Dragonfly table lamp features a shade and a base that have been constructed from over 400 individual pieces of individually cut stained glass. 

It's highlighted by a ring of red dragonflies at the bottom of the shade, which also features a primary hue of blue that's accented with aqua green and sand. The intricately molded base is constructed of black metal. The lamp uses two 60-watt bulbs (maximum) in the shade, and the base is also illuminated by a single 25-watt candelabra bulb (light bulbs not included). It's operated via two pull chains.

WAREHOUSE OF TIFFANY
Warehouse of Tiffany reproduces the famous stained glass lighting designs of Louis Comfort Tiffany and brings them to you at an affordable price. Elite craftsmanship combined with eye-catching colors and innovative designs create timeless lighting fixtures each made using high-quality glass and metal materials. Warehouse of Tiffany offers an extensive variety of styles to suit any aesthetic from ornate classical to sleek contemporary offering you the chance to own a decorative and functional work of art at a fraction of the cost. With fine detailing and superb workmanship these fixtures will last a lifetime.

T18275TGRB DRAGONFLY TIFFANY-STYLE 26-INCH TABLE LAMP
AT A GLANCE
 * Stunning table lamp with intricately detailed Tiffany-style shade
 * Two lights in shade (60-watt maximum), plus illuminated glass base (25-watt candelabra)
 * Operated via two ball-style pull chains
 * Measures 26 inches tall, 18 inches in diameter
 * Intricately molded metal foundation
 * Bulbs not included
feature_bullets: Stunning table lamp with intricately detailed Tiffany-style shade
400+ brightly colored pieces of hand cut stained glass
Intricately molded metal foundation; lighted base; ball-style pull chain
Uses 2 60-watt (max) bulbs in the shade and 1 25-watt (max) bulb in the base (bulbs not included)
Measures approximately 18 inches in diameter by 26 inches high
25 watts is the maximum, but 15 watts recommended
